statements: SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports;
SELECT usage_date, minutes_active FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports WHERE energy_usage > 50;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports WHERE energy_usage > 50 ORDER BY usage_date DESC, minutes_active ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT device_id, MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 2 ORDER BY max_energy_usage DESC;

SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_energy_usage DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT device_id, AVG(minutes_active) AS avg_minutes_active, COUNT(*) AS usage_reports_count FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports GROUP BY device_id HAVING avg_minutes_active > 30 ORDER BY usage_reports_count DESC;
SELECT device_id, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage_per_day FROM SmartHomeDeviceUsageReports WHERE usage_date LIKE '2021-09%' GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY avg_energy_usage_per_day DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_activity FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY last_activity DESC;
SELECT report_id, device_id, report_date, usage_hours FROM usage_reports WHERE usage_hours > 10 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(report_id) AS reports_count FROM usage_reports GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light'
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_activity FROM smart_home_devices WHERE last_activity >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM usage_reports WHERE usage_hours > 10 ORDER BY report_date DESC

SELECT device_name, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM smart_home_devices JOIN usage_reports ON smart_home_devices.device_id = usage_reports.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING total_reports > 5
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM query_results WHERE execution_time > 5.0;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND device_type = 'light';
SELECT * FROM usage_reports WHERE total_usage > 100;
SELECT query_text, execution_time FROM query_results ORDER BY execution_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, total_usage FROM smart_home_devices JOIN usage_reports ON smart_home_devices.device_id = usage_reports.device_id;
SELECT * FROM smarthome_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smarthome_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smarthome_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM smarthome_devices WHERE device_type = 'Lighting' AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, is_active FROM smarthome_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Kitchen%';
SELECT * FROM smarthome_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smarthome_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT usage_date, usage_time, usage_duration FROM device_usage WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY usage_date DESC, usage_time ASC;
SELECT device_id, status, status_date FROM device_status WHERE status = 'offline';
SELECT device_id, report_type, total_usage_duration FROM usage_reports WHERE total_usage_duration > 100 ORDER BY total_usage_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT owner_name, device_name, device_location FROM device_owners JOIN smart_home_devices ON device_owners.device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id;
SELECT * FROM usage_reports WHERE power_consumed > 100;
SELECT device_id, status, last_updated FROM device_status ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type='Light' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_location='Living Room';
SELECT d.device_name, r.report_date, r.power_consumed FROM smart_home_devices d JOIN usage_reports r ON d.device_id = r.device_id WHERE r.power_consumed > 100 ORDER BY r.report_date ASC;
SELECT de.*, ds.status, ds.last_updated FROM device_errors de JOIN device_status ds ON de.device_id = ds.device_id WHERE ds.status='Offline' AND de.error_message LIKE '%connection%';
SELECT do.owner_name, COUNT(ds.status) AS total_devices FROM device_status ds JOIN device_owners do ON ds.device_id = do.device_id GROUP BY do.owner_name ORDER BY total_devices DESC;
